}} 'Malthouse Broad' is a broad (i.e., lake) at Ranworth in the Norfolk Broads.

The "Helen of Ranworth" is a traditional reed lighter, a boat that carried
away the reed harvest. Now it ferries visitors from Malthouse Broad to
Ranworth Broad.
